author: smartini
msg: JavaScript Console Test: complete the decode of labels even for all-JS code (but for simplify things, using a Java helper method to handle some load/retrieval details).
Note: this test has many comments inside (and code commented), because it show a way to learn different approaches to the same problem, even as an evolving test.

author: elecharny
msg: Exposed the revision number and the transaction creation date

author: alexdma
msg: Moved connectivity policy to all OWLExportable objects, implemented tight connectivity policy for session ontologies as well. This resolves STANBOL-681. For more elaborate policies please open a new ticket.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5501: Optimized XPathBuilder to cleanup thread locals after evaluation. Optimized performance under load by only using 1 thread local. Ensures better GC as well when using @XPath annotation.
